name: Ethereal (itch) (MrBones98)
description:
Ethereal is a 2D, stylized, indie inspired platformer. Visually driven, short, and sweet.

Go through two ethereal worlds towards the portal, there must be a reason for it!

Our boi is strong! Jump once or twice! Bounce back from a wall, dash off of disappearing and moving platforms to collect all the potions.

Only then, you could handle the seller's strongest potion...

Art: TheLunarPrincess

Programming & Design: Daniel R. Salas S.
